body:
Hi you can see my username so.. Ye, I joined this server... Idk when xD

And i've enjoyed it since.. However, I see avicus is down, so while it is i might be active on forums :3.
So i hope to see you around

Interests:

Pot PVP
Soup PVP
Avicus :3

Skilled at:

Pvp
Drawing
Swimming
Basket Ball
Futball

Btw im from UK xD, but i think im decent at... English :) 

Hope to see you around!!! :D, I don't have much to say about me... Im a person with gewd People as friends.. I guess xD..
